page.title: 03EDUCATION:(1) QUINTON
page.content: The village{school}is in purpose built{accommodation}towards the newer end of the village. It has grown in the past to accommodate over two hundred children, many of whom have come from army quarters. About one third of the children in school are from non-service families. Many parents have chosen to send their children to other schools, especially army boarding schools.There is a high turnover of children for this reason and because of army postings. About{130 children}are currently on roll, in{five classes.}The school is investing time and money to present a modern and structured education.Staff commitment is high, and many have recently obtained promotion.The school comes under{Warks. county. Children here are{aged 4-11.
